attributes.action: Change central or local gvernment use of 0870,0845 and similar calls to local or STD numbers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Enable OFCOM to enforce change of 0870, 0845 and similar expensive call cost numbers to all govenment offices to be changed to 01 or 02 geographic STD numbers or local call numbers.
